measured_by: Vocabulary size score based on highest familiarity bin with ≤1 unknown word
justification: “Participant vocabulary size was established as follows… we identified the highest familiarity bin in which the participant did not know more than one real word… we subtract these numbers from 51 to get the final vocabulary score.”

measured_by: Response time in visual lexical decision task
justification: “Our main analysis focused on response times of 'yes' responses to existing words in the experiment. Our outcome variable was untransformed response time in each trial.”

measured_by: Familiarity score (1–50) from pilot word-rating study
justification: “A separate set of four hundred participants rated these words in a previous pilot experiment… we split into 50 bins based on word familiarity… each had a familiarity score between 1 and 50.”

measured_by: Reaction time in simple visual detection task
justification: “We used two processing speed measures, one from a simple visual task (detecting the image of a polka-dot ball on the screen)… we used the median response time values garnered from each processing speed task.”

measured_by: Reaction time in visual orientation decision task
justification: “…and a visual decision task (judging whether two visual grating plots have the same orientation). For each participant… we used the median response time values garnered from each processing speed task.”
